name: Together (itch) (skaminska)
description:
Hi. This is my game for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. I'm new in game dev so this game is quite simple and short. I made all by myself and that was the first time ever making animation.

!!! If you go through the wall you can reload level by ESC->R !!!

Your goal is to open the door by standing on all buttons on each level. You need to use multiple characters to pass the levels.

WASD or ARROW KEY  - moving
SPACE - jump
E - interact with switches
TAB - go to next character
ESC - in game menu
